attributes.action: Make It Illegal For Parents/Carers To Hit their child in any situation.
attributes.additional_details: Make it illegal for parents to hit their Child, this is because a child being hit could cause problems in many ways. One of the few ways is that kids could get depression or worse. This is one of the many ways it could affect the child's feature.
attributes.background: Make it illegal for parents to hit their child in any situation.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/604542
